kafka.etl.impl

类 DataGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • kafka.etl.impl.DataGenerator

  • public class DataGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Use this class to produce test events to Kafka server. Each event contains a random timestamp in text format.
